person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Zimbabwe hanged a convicted murderer on Friday , bringing to eight the number of executions carried out in the past year .

1. The paragraph does not provide the name of the convicted murderer who was executed. Therefore, we cannot identify a specific "Person" entity in this context.
2. The paragraph mentions the country "Zimbabwe" carrying out the execution, but countries are not considered "Person" entities.
3. Therefore, there are no "Person" entities in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
As there are no "Person" entities mentioned in the paragraph, there is no need to remove any irrelevant entities.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
